modName: Enhanced Sun Spells and Sun Light Enchantment
summary: A small mod made that edits sun light spells and effects.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][size=5]This mod is no longer supported. Consider it a modders resource.[/size][/color]

This mod adds a Sunlight Enchantment to the game and makes several changes to Sun Fire Dawnguard spells.

[color=#ff0000][u]Enchantment[/u][/color]

The enchantment has the following effect: "Does x amount of sun damage to the enemy, and double that amount to undead, Deadra and Werebeasts." All weapons can be disenchanted.

I have put the enchantment on every kind of Vanilla weapon (Dagger, Sword, War Axe, Mace, Greatsword, Battleaxe, Warhammer, Bow) and every weapon material except Dragonbone.

The weapons with the enchantment are added to the leveled lists. So shops and chests will randomly contain them. Enemies *may* also carry them, though very rarely.

[color=#ff0000][u]Spells[/u][/color]

I made changes to Sun Fire, Vampire's Bane and Stendarr's Aura.

These spells will do following BASE damage:

[list]
[*]Sun Fire: 20 to normal enemies, 40 to Undead, Daedra and Werebeasts.
[/list][list]
[*]Vampire's Bane: 30 to normal enemies, 60 to Undead, Daedra and Werebeasts.
[*]Stendarr's Aura: 12 dmg per second to normal enemies, 24 dmg per second to Undead, Daedra and Werebeasts.
[/list]
Vigilants of Stendarr and certain members of the Dawnguard will now use these spells.

The Spell Tomes will be for sale at Sorine's shop in For Dawnguard.

I also added Scrolls and Staffs for Sun Fire and Vampire's Bane.

[color=#ff0000][u]Requirements[/u][/color]

This mod REQUIRES Dawnguard. Without it you will crash to desktop at startup.

Lootification is NO LONGER needed for the latest version.

If you use any other mods that edit the leveled lists (weapon mods in particular), you should make a Bashed Patch with Wrye Bash.

Gamerpoets made a video on how to do this:

[youtube]W1Es06MtAZM[/youtube]

[color=#ff0000][u]Final notes[/u][/color]

I made this mod for personal use originally, but afterwards I decided to upload it so that everyone can benefit from it.

I give everyone permission to edit/improve/expand the ESP, as long as it isn't used for any paid modding projects.

[color=#ff0000][u]Credits[/u][/color]

- Bethesda - For Skyrim and the ability to mod it.
- Dienes - For the wonderful tool [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32339/?]Lootification[/url]
- Steelfeathers - For the amazing mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68587/?]Path of Sorcery[/url]
